mapper.insert: INSERT INTO approval( user_id, doc_cat_cd, aprv_title, aprv_contents, aprv_ymd, rjct_reason, reference, c_date, u_date ) VALUES ( #{user_id}, #{doc_cat_cd}, #{aprc_title}, #{aprv_contents}, #{aprv_ymd}, #{rjct_reason}, #{reference}, NOW(), NOW() )
INSERT INTO approval_file( aprv_no, orgin_filename, save_filename, filetype, path ) VALUES( #{orgin_filename}, #{save_filename}, #{filetype}, #{path} )
INSERT INTO approbal_line( aprv_no, user_id, aprv_yn, aprv_sequence aprv_ymd ) VALUES( #{user_id}, #{aprv_yn}, #{aprv_sequence}, NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT a.aprv_no, a.user_id, a.doc_cat_cd, a.aprv_title, a.aprv_contents, a.aprv_ymd, a.rjct_reason, a.aprv_stat_cd, a.reference, a.c_date, af.orgin_filename, af.save_filename, al.aprv_yn, al.aprv_ymd as aprv_line_ymd FROM approval a LEFT JOIN approval_file af ON a.aprv_no = af.aprv_no LEFT JOIN approval_line al ON a.aprv_no = al.aprv_no WHERE a.user_id = #{loginId} AND a.aprv_stat_cd = #{status} ORDER BY a.aprv_ymd DESC;
select code from common_code where group_code = 'A001' and code_nm = #{approvalStatus}

SELECT a.aprv_no, a.user_id, a.doc_cat_cd, a.aprv_title, a.aprv_contents, a.aprv_ymd, a.rjct_reason, a.aprv_stat_cd, a.reference, a.c_date, af.orgin_filename, af.save_filename, al.aprv_yn, al.aprv_ymd as aprv_line_ymd FROM approval a LEFT JOIN approval_file af ON a.aprv_no = af.aprv_no LEFT JOIN approval_line al ON a.aprv_no = al.aprv_no WHERE a.user_id = #{loginId} AND (a.aprv_stat_cd = #{rejectedStatus} OR a.aprv_stat_cd = #{withdrawnStatus}) ORDER BY a.aprv_ymd DESC;

SELECT a.aprv_no, a.user_id, a.doc_cat_cd, a.aprv_title, a.aprv_contents, a.aprv_ymd, a.rjct_reason, a.aprv_stat_cd, a.reference, a.c_date, af.orgin_filename, af.save_filename, al.aprv_yn, al.aprv_ymd as aprv_line_ymd FROM approval a LEFT JOIN approval_file af ON a.aprv_no = af.aprv_no LEFT JOIN approval_line al ON a.aprv_no = al.aprv_no WHERE a.aprv_no = #{aprvNo} ORDER BY al.aprv_sequence;
